price: ߊߟߊ߫ ߸ ߡߊ߰ߙߌ߬ ߜߘߍ߫ ߕߍ߫ ߊ߬ߟߋ߬ ߞߐ߫ ߸ ߣߌߡߊ ߟߋ߬ ߸ ߟߐ߬ߣߍ߲ߒߖߘߍ߬ߟߊ ߟߋ߬
arabic: ٱللَّهُ لَآ إِلَٰهَ إِلَّا هُوَ ٱلۡحَيُّ ٱلۡقَيُّومُ

version.title: N'ko translation - Baba Mamadi
version.description: Translation of the meanings of the Noble Qur'an into the N'ko language, translated by Karamo / Baba Mamadi Jani.

meta.transliteration: al-lahu lā ilāha illā huwa al-ḥayu al-qayūmu
translations: the Sustainer of all that exists
